name: 戦国の木こり
description:
"War era Lumberjack" is a mini-game in the process of making a simulation game during the Warring States period in Japan.

This is a game in which you have a lumberjack cut down trees and compete for how much wood you can collect within a certain period of time.
Players can only order which trees to cut.

In the future, the functions will be expanded little by little.
Please enjoy.
